original_text: Eli's eyes had become weak. He could not see very well. One night, he was sleeping in his usual place.
korean_text: 엘리의 눈이 점점 어두워 가서 잘 보지 못하는 그 때에 그가 자기 처소에 누웠고

sentences.original_text: He could not see very well.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 매우 잘 볼 수 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: One night, he was sleeping in his usual place.
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 밤, 그는 평소의 장소에서 잠을 자고 있었습니다.
